info.title: Operate an expanded disclosure button in reading mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusToAndExpandFirstDisclosure
setupScript.description: sets focus on the first disclosure button, and sets its state to expanded

user: With the reading cursor on the first disclosure button in the navigation region, set the state of the button to collapsed.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the first disclosure button in the navigation region, set the state of the button to collapsed.
instructions.mode: Insure NVDA is in browse mode by pressing Escape. Note: This command has no effect if NVDA is already in browse mode.

assertions.expectation: Change in state (to collapsed) is conveyed
